Semaphore Documentation

Version information

Builds on Semaphore run on Ubuntu 11.04 Natty. Different Ruby versions are available via rbenv:

  • 1.9.2-p290
  • 1.9.3-p194
  • ree-1.8.7-2012.02
  • JRuby 1.6.7.2

System packages installed by default include:

Name Version
Firefox 13.0.1
libqtwebkit4 2.1
imagemagick 7:6.6.2.6
Java (openjdk) 6b22
Linux kernel 3.0.0-12
memcached 1.4.5
MongoDB 2.0.2
MySQL 5.1.54
Node.js 0.6.5
PhantomJS 1.6
PostgreSQL 9.1.4
Redis 2:2.0.1
Sphinx 0.9.9
sqlite 3.7.4
wkhtmltopdf 0.9.9

Note: this is a partial list. Upgrades and additional packages are available on request.
